physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Somnolent but arousable by verbal stimuli; neck rigidity; nonverbal but could write name and follow simple commands; pupils equal, round, reactive to light (from 4 to 2 mm); unable to fully abduct the right eye; lower facial weakness on right side; lifted limbs against gravity without drift.
Intermittent generalized background slowing on electroencephalogram; blurred optic-disk margins; bilateral abducens palsies; decreased visual acuity (20/800 in each eye).
Visual acuity improved (20/40 in right eye, 20/30 in left eye); optic disks flat. Diplopia and abducens palsies resolved.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in vision and resolution of diplopia and abducens palsies.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Alert and oriented; decreased speech output; impaired attention and repetition; subtle pronator drift in right hand; moderate postural and intention tremors bilaterally; narrow-based stance and stride with unsteadiness leaning to the left.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening headaches and tremors; decreased mobility.
